mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mountflorence, James C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: On Sunday, Sept. 1st, sets sail for Amsterdam on American ship "Cheeseman," then goes to Paris; shall be glad to take communications to Mr. [William] Short at the Hague or Mr. Morris at Paris; in case vessel is captured, will throw his communications into the sea, if he is so ordered.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Short, William, 1759-1849
Morris, Gouverneur, 1752-1816
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1793 August 27, New York, [New York] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
